channel.title: Josh Brolin on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Josh Brolin on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Josh Brolin and Julia Garner Clash in ‘Weapons’ But Their Bond Off-Screen Was “Cellular, Sibling Sh**”
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe alums traded compliments at the ‘Weapons’ premiere in L.A. “We just hit it off immediately,” Brolin said with a smile. “We hung out a lot, which never happens.”

item.title: Josh Brolin and Julia Garner Clash in ‘Weapons’ But Their Bond Off-Screen Was “Cellular, Sibling Sh**”
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe alums traded compliments at the ‘Weapons’ premiere in L.A. “We just hit it off immediately,” Brolin said with a smile. “We hung out a lot, which never happens.”

item.title: ‘Weapons’ Review: Julia Garner and Josh Brolin in Zach Cregger’s Enthrallingly Strange but Psychologically Lite Follow-Up to ‘Barbarian’
item.description: Alden Ehrenreich, Austin Abrams and Amy Madigan also star in this horror mystery about the disappearance one night of 17 elementary school classmates.

item.title: ‘Weapons’ Review: The Kids Are Far From All Right in a Hypnotic Horror Mystery That Pits Parents Against Teachers
item.description: SPOILER ALERT: The following review contains mild spoilers. At 2:17 a.m. on a school night, 17 children go missing all at once. They get up out of bed, open their front doors and run out into the nigh
